attributes.title: Projected Increase in Maximum Monthly Summer Air Temperature -- U.S. (Sonoma County)
attributes.citation: L.E. Flint and A.L. Flint, 2014, California Basin Characterization Model: A Dataset of Historical and Future Hydrologic Response to Climate Change, U.S. Geological Survey Data Release, doi:10.5066/F76T0JPB
attributes.short-description: Data are maps of maximum monthly summer air temperature in ÂºF for 30-year periods 1951-1980, 1980-2010, 2010-2039, 2040-2069, and 2070-2099 assuming continued increases in global emissions (RCP 8.5) for National Center for Atmospheric Research model CCSM4.
attributes.subtitle: USGS California Basin Characterization Model
